snippet: The moves announced Wednesday included immediate efforts to speed up a crackdown on money laundering that had been scheduled to take effect in 2017.
abstract: France and Germany announce plans to cut off money flowing to Islamic State, including a crackdown on money laundering, and will urge 26 other European nations to do same.
lead_paragraph: The moves announced Wednesday included immediate efforts to speed up a crackdown on money laundering that had been scheduled to take effect in 2017.

headline.main: France and Germany Move to Block Flow of Money to ISIS
headline.print_headline: Europe; France and Germany Aim to Cut Off Flow of Money to Islamic State Group

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
